messages.message: The Hardware tab provides information about the connect 2 hardware status.
The Software tab provides various version information.
The Network tab provides information about all the network interfaces available on the system.
The Routes info tab provides information about all the network routes active on the system, being retrieved directly from the OS kernel.
The Axeda Agent tab provides various information about the Agent.
The certificate tab provides various information about all certificates installed on the connect 2.

The type of IP-Address assignment for the external network can be set (manual or automatic).
The external network is dedicated for the connection to the home server (Roche Axeda Enterprise server).

The wireless network tab allows to configure all necessary parameter for WiFi connections.
The wireless network is dedicated for the connection to the home server (Roche Axeda Enterprise server).

The mobile network tab allows to configure all necessary parameter for mobile (e.g. 3G) connections.
The mobile network is dedicated for the connection to the home server (Roche Axeda Enterprise server).

The type of IP-Address assignment for the device network can be set (manual or automatic).
The device network is dedicated for the connection to supported systems (e.g. Integra 400 plus).
The DHCP Server is required simplify the access the connect 2 web interface.

The Home Server identifies the Axeda Enterprise Server (ServiceLink environment).
Ensure to use the correct value before installing a connect 2.

Depending on the customer infrastructure, proxy configuration must be made or not.
The necessary information must be provided by the customer. The settings affect the Axeda Agent connectivity going via the external network.

The Routes tab provides the capability to manually configure network routes. This is necessary for special network architectures, where the system cannot automatically detect the correct route.
Example:
The customer has a proxy server with an IP-Address the connect 2 uses for the device network. Without a static route, the system would forward all Axeda Agent traffic to the device network, where it would never reach the home server.
By setting a static route, the traffic can explicitly be routed via the external network.

The Hosts tab provides the capability to manually configure URL / IPs for lookup, if no DNS Server is provided by the customer.
If a Roche B2B VPN is in place, this has to be configured here as well due to other IP-Addresses used by the Roche B2BVPN setup.
This tab offers the capability to manage various system settings.
This tab offers the capability to load previously exported system configuration files from the same or other connect 2 systems.
This tab offers the capability to load system update files, which are provided by TeleService for manual installation.
This tab offers the capabilities for advanced connectivity diagnosis.
This tab offers the capabilities for system diagnosis.
This tab offers the capabilities to display and download the Event Log.
This tab offers the capabilities to view and download the Audit Log.
This tab offers the capabilities to download the Axeda Agent Log.
This tab offers the capabilities to download the logs of various system services.

This tab offers the capabilities to configure the root log level for the event log.
Lowest level is "ERROR", highest level is "TRACE". Higher level include all logging from lower levels.

This tab shows vendor and general version information.
See overview / software for detailed version description.
This tab shows general license information for connect 2 and embedded open source software.
Stop the Axeda Agent. Note: If the agent is stopped for more than 3 minutes, connect 2 is rebooted.
Download the current configuration to a file.
Apply the current configuration settings to connect 2.
Discard all changes and refresh all values from the system.
Display the help page for the currently selected tab.

Are you sure you want to reload the system settings?
Warning: All unsaved data will be lost!

Are you sure you want to reboot the connect 2 device?
Warning: All unsaved data will be lost!
Please also note that in case you are connected through Axeda Service Link, the current session will be terminated and you need to establish a new one!

The Axeda Agent must be restarted in order to make the configuration changes effective.
Do you want to restart it now?
Failed to retrieve the system information.
